author: Katie Shepherd
title: 28 University of Texas spring breakers who flouted public health advice test positive for coronavirus - The Washington Post
description: 28 University of Texas spring breakers who flouted public health advice test positive for coronavirus The Washington Post 28 University of Texas spring breakers test positive for COVID-19 after group trip to Mexico NBC News 28 University of Texas Students Tes…
content:
About 70 students from the University of Texas at Austin, all in their 20s, chartered a plane to Cabo San Lucas, Mexico, in late March. They took the trip despite public health advice to avoid crowding as well as nonessential air travel.
